meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>lifespan</kanji> is your <kanji>fate</kanji> and will show you how long your <vocabulary>lifespan</vocabulary> is.
readingMnemonic: You did learn the reading of 寿, but the reading for 命 is an exception. When you think of a lifespan, think of how that affects everyone. Me, you... well, just those things. Combine them both into <reading>myou</reading> (みょう). That is who the lifespan affects. Myou!
